item.description: 在Windows中搭建Homsetead使用命令vagrant up 报错 1 2 3 4 5 $ vagrant up Bringing machine 'homestead-7' up with 'virtualbox' provider... D:/HashiCorp/Vagrant/embedded/gems/2.2.6/gems/vagrant-2.2.6/plugins/provisioners/file/config.rb:20:in `expand_path': incompatible character encodings: UTF-8 and GBK (Encoding::CompatibilityError) from D:/HashiCorp/Vagrant/embedded/gems/2.2.6/gems/vagrant-2.2.6/plugins/provisioners/file/config.rb:20:in `expand_path' from D:/HashiCorp/Vagrant/embedded/gems/2.2.6/gems/vagrant-2.2.6/plugins/provisioners/file/config.rb:20:in `validate' 原因就是用户
